benefits.ingameeffect: 'Jack Marshaled warjacks and the units that control them gain Advance Deployment
Models/units in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game

You can redeploy one Trencher model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially

For each trencher commando or Trencher Infantry unit, place on trench template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Haley's deployement zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Trench templates cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature but can be placed within 3" of each other.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

tiers.name: Stryker2 - Charge of the Storm Brigade

benefits.ingameeffect: Reduce the point cost of Stormguard units by 1.
After deployment but before the start of the game, you can place any number of your Stormwalls' Lightning Pods anywhere within 20" of the rear edge of your deployment zone.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.
During your first Control Phase of the game, warjacks in Nemo's battlegroup are each allocated 1 focus point.

tiers.name: Constance Blaize - Knights of the Prophet

benefits.ingameeffect: Add a Necrotech solo free of cost for each helljack or colossal in the army. These solos ignore FA restrictions.
Pistol Wraith solos gain Advance Deployment
For each unit in the army, one model can begin the game with a corpse or soul token.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.
Increase the FA of non-character cavalry units and solos by 1.
You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.
Reduce the point cost of heavy warjacks without ranged weapons by 1.

For each Choir of Menoth unit in the army, one heavy warjack in the army gains Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Reclaimer solos each begin with one soul token
Flameguard cleanser units gain Advance Move

For each heavy warjack, place one 3" AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of High Rec1aimer's deployment zone after both players have finished deploying their armies but before the first player takes his first turn. These cloud effects leave play after the first round of the game.
Holy zealots units gains Advance Deployment.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game
Models/units gains Incorporeal during your first turn of the game.
Temple Flameguard units gain Advance Move.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

For each warjack in Feora's battlegroup with the Continuous Effect: Fire weapon quality, place one wall template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Feora's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. When a model enters or ends its activation in the wall area, it suffers an unboostable POW 12 fire damage roll and the Fire continuous effect. Models within the wall template gain concealment. These wall templates leave play after the first round of the game.
Flameguard units gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward
Deliverer Sunburst Crews gain Advance Deployment

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Reznik's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either players sets up models. Reznik does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward
For each Daughter of the Flames unit in the army, one warjack in Thyra's battlegroup gains Advance Move.
Models in the army gain Stealth during the first round of the game.
Warjacks in Thyra's battlegroup are each allocated 1 focus at the start of you first Control Phase of the game.
Increase the FA of non-character cavalry solos, units, and battle engines by 1.
Warjacks in this army gain +2 SPD during y our first turn of the game.
You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.
Reduce the cost of warjacks in this army by 1.

tiers.name: Rahn - Charge of the Battle Mages
epic Vyros - Legions of the Dawn
Ravyn - Will of the Nine Voices
epic Kaya - Call of the Wild
Makeda - Army of the Western Reaches

benefits.ingameeffect: Aptimus Marketh and Ancestral Guardian solos start the game with a soul token
Gain +1 to the roll at the start of the game.
Add Agonizer FA for each titan included.
